alpin{{Motorsport season |series = British Saloon Car Championship |title =
British Saloon Car Championship |year = 1969 }}

The '1969 [[British Touring Car Championship|British Saloon Car Championship]]',
was the 12th season of the championship. The title was won by Alec Poole in a
Mini Cooper S. http://www.btcc.net/html/history_stats.php?statstype_id=1
Official list of BTCC champions http://homepage.mac.com/frank_de_jong-
/Pages/1969%20BSCC.html
